text: GAE webapp alternative working outside of GAE environment
I like working with GAE environment as well as with its webapp framework.
I am creating a web application using GAE environment.
What I think about is how to create a version of my application that could run in another environment, like some other hosting or cloud service the easiest way.
I know I will have to think about database storage alternative too and some other features that GAE gives and is not available on another platform out of the box.
But now I wonder just about webapp framework.
So, what can I use as alternative to this in GAE?
May be some existing framework that is as much as possible close to GAE webapp?
I know it is using webob, may be somebody has already implemented this alternative?
